projects.title: Portfolio Website - Larbaco.com
projects.description: Modern developer portfolio built with React.js and Firebase, featuring responsive design and multilingual support (EN/PT). Implements dynamic resume rendering, project showcases with NEAT AI/sparse matrix case studies, and SEO optimization through React Helmet.

projects.title: Zelda-NeAI
projects.description: NES Zelda recreation with NEAT AI integration - Python game engine using arcade library featuring tile-based maps, collision systems, and multi-room transitions, designed to evolve neural networks for autonomous dungeon navigation and combat through NeuroEvolution of Augmenting Topologies (genetic algorithm). Includes sensor input processing for player/enemy positions and fitness metrics for evolutionary learning.

projects.title: MatrizEsparsa
projects.description: Academic C implementation of sparse matrix operations using linked list storage, featuring memory-efficient addition/multiplication algorithms, CLI interface, and Python data conversion tools. Developed for high-performance computing scenarios with file I/O support and element-wise manipulation capabilities.

projects.title: Resume Editor - Self-Hosted
projects.description: Bilingual resume editor (EN/PT) with Node.js/Express backend and vanilla JavaScript frontend, featuring real-time JSON data management, REST API integration, and modular CSS architecture. Supports section-based editing with validation, local persistence, and mobile-responsive UI following 7-1 pattern with BEM methodology.
